reference.title: Example plugin.xml file
reference.shortdesc: The following is a sample of a plugin.xml file. This file adds support for a new set of specialized DTDs, and includes an override for the XHTML output processor.

section.p: This plugin.xml file would go into a directory such as DITA-OT/plugins/music/ and referenced supporting files would also exist in that directory. A more extensive sample using these values is available in the actual music plug-in, available on SourceForge.
